Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class EndGameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.ControllerGuiInterface
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.EndGameController
public class EndGameController
extends ControllerGuiInterface
Controller of the pane showed at the end of the game Show players rank and allow just to exit from the game
